name: Driving School 3D
description:
Driving School 3D is a realistic driving simulator that will teach you to drive many different cars. Driving School 3D includes amazing environments like cities, country, highways and mountains with complex roads.
You will learn to drive a manual transmission with clutch or you can stick to common automatic gearbox. Choose between on-screen steering wheel or other control options to control vehicle. Switch vehicle cameras and learn different road rules with this driving simulator.
Enter multiplayer challenges and play with your friends or enter racing mode. If you had enough driving, you can get out of the car!
Play more than 80 levels with different driving rules and conditions. Mod your vehicles, show your skills and get your driving licence now! Play Driving School 3D!

Features
• Many different vehicles available to unlock and customize!
• 4 detailed maps with more than 80 different levels
• Play third-person mode and exit vehicle!
• Smooth car handling
• Realistic damage system.
• Stop at the gas stations and refill
• Buttons, tilt and wheel steering options
• Online leaderboard
• Real engine sounds
